summary: The EPA has a program that assesses the safety of chemicals used in consumer and industrial products. In the past, the program was criticized for slow results and a lack of transparency in the assessment process. We found EPA made improvements in both areas of the assessment process. Its review process, for example, provided a clear view of the work behind its assessments. However, between...
title: Chemical Assessments: Status of EPA's Efforts to Produce Assessments and Implement the Toxic Substances Control Act
